General.Name: Tainan Enterprises Co Ltd
General.Description: Tainan Enterprises Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the manufacturing, retail, and exports of woven and knitted garments. Its products include ready-to-wear, active wear, and denim products. The company serves in the United States, Japan, China, Taiwan, Cambodia, Vietnam, Indonesia, and internationally. Tainan Enterprises Co., Ltd. was incorporated in 1961 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 15-1, Han-Chou South Road, Taipei, Taiwan
